webhook_json_updates.description: Add these fields to your webhook JSON response to configure dynamic WhatsApp messaging

order_data.{{order_items}}: Formatted list of ordered items with quantities and prices

custom_variables.{{store_name}}: You can add custom text like store name in the template

implementation_notes.phone_number: Should be in international format without + sign (e.g., 919742462600 for India)
implementation_notes.message_template: Use double curly braces {{variable_name}} for dynamic content
implementation_notes.fallback: If whatsapp config is not provided, defaults to phone: 919742462600 and current message format
implementation_notes.emoji_encoding: Emojis are automatically URL encoded for WhatsApp compatibility
